archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.2.4: The information security function should support the procurement team by specifying security requirements to be included in the Request for Information (RFI) and Request for Tender (RFT).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
